segments.text: Yes . Swimming is one of my most favorite sports , indoors or out-doors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . Swimming is a very good exercise for health . It combines water , bath , sunbath , and air bath together . It promotes the growth and haleness of muscles , bone , viscera and nerve systems .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have never thought that swimming can bring us so many benefits . I only know that swimming in great waves and deep running water can train people's spirits , and enable people to be fearless of the hardships , dangers and difficulties and become brave and staunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever swum in a river or a lake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but not always . However , I won't let it go if I have a chance .
segments.speaker: S2
